scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.ci: npm run ci:client && npm run ci:server
scripts.start: npm run build && cd server && npm run start
scripts.first-time: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd .. && npm run start
